byline.original: By ERIC LIPTON and JOHN M. BRODER

snippet: A senior Energy Department official inquired frequently about the progress of the loan even though his wife’s law firm represented the company and he promised to recuse himself.
lead_paragraph: A senior Energy Department official inquired frequently about the progress of the loan even though his wife’s law firm represented the company and he promised to recuse himself.

headline.main: E-Mail Shows Senior Energy Official Pushed Solyndra Loan
headline.print_headline: E-Mail Shows Official Pushed Solyndra Loan
